column5: Come visit this urban luxury 1bd/1bath condo. Bedroom has king tempur-pedic mattress w/tv that has roku access.Twin & queen air mattress available. Beautiful views w/huge balcony to relax on.Smart TV in living room, internet included.Jet jacuzzi in bathroom. Everything in the kitchen for your use.Washer,dryer &iron available.Guests have access to olympic size salt water pool w/grill & fireplace.Gym,pool tables&computer room access.Located across the street from the stunning J.W. Marriott Resort.
